name: Potionomics
summary:
Potionomics is a PC video game about the business side of potion brewing.
Assume the role of a penniless witch named Sylvia who must save her debt-ridden potion shop from the clutches of greedy loan sharks.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: SIM
  • 官方网站: http://potionomics.com/
  • 开发: Voracious Games
  • 发行: XSEED Games
